str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To glorify, honor, bestow glory on. From doxa; to render glorious.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To glorify, honor, bestow glory on. From doxa; to render glorious.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A part, portion, share. From an obsolete but more primary form of meiromai; a division or share.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Feminine Singular
str2: To surpass, excel, exceed, transcend. From huper and ballo; to throw beyod the usual mark, i.e. to surpass.
